translation.Senha letra maiuscula: Password must contain at least one capital letter
translation.Senha letra minuscula: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
translation.Senha caracter especial: The password must contain at least one special character
translation.Senha digito: The password must contain at least one digit
translation.Senha oito caracteres: Password must contain at least 8 characters
translation.Nós estamos aqui para cuidar do seu: We're here to take care of your
translation.Fazemos nossos clientes felizes oferecen: We make our clients happy by offering a top treatment and stay that your pet deserves

Descrição dos quartos.shared: Our most affordable option. A great choice if you'd like your dog to interact with others and make friends
Descrição dos quartos.cats: A luxurious private bedroom for your classy feline companion
Descrição dos quartos.dogs: Looking for comfort and privacy for your dog friend? The private room is the ideal option

translation.Inscreva-se para receber nossas promoçõe: Subscribe to receive our promotions and news
translation.Adorei o meu quartinho, digno de um rei!: I loved my little room, fit for a king
translation.Texto do footer: Me-au is a pet hotel founded in September, 2022. Our goal is your furry baby happiness.
translation.Texto sobre nós - pagina contato: Me-au is a pet hotel that cares about your pet's well-being, we have employees working 24/7 to maintain the safety and care of the little animals. Me-au was founded in 2022, São Paulo - SP by a small team of entrepreneurs and grew quickly due to the excellent competence and attentiveness of the entire team, We only offer high quality products and a highly trained team that loves animals, all members hold credentials from Pet Caretakers LTDA. Bring your pet and we guarantee unforgettable days for your furry!

RoomServices.Ótimo custo benefício, essa opção é idea: Great cost-benefit, this option is ideal for you who wants your pet to interact with other doggies!
RoomServices.Busca conforto e privacidade para o seu: Looking for comfort and privacy for your doggie? The private room is the right choice!
RoomServices.Quarto privativo de alto padrão para o s: Luxury private room for your cat to enjoy with elegance!

translation.Tem certeza que deseja excluir o pet?: Are you sure you want to delete this pet?
translation.Para redefinir sua senha preencha o camp: To redefine your password inform your email
translation.Por favor preencha com o código enviado: Please inform the code sent in the following email
translation.Sua nova senha deve ser diferente das se: Your new password must be different from any previous password
translation.Cadastre um pet usando o formulário abai: Register a pet using the form below
translation.Não é possível selecionar um gato nesse: It's not possible to select a cat for this room
translation.Não é possível selecionar um cachorro ne: It's not possible to select a dog for this room
It was not possible to register.
It was not possible to add your review.
translation.Tem certeza de que deseja cancelar a res: Are you sure you want to cancel the reservation?
translation.Informe o número de pets que deseja hosp: Inform the number of pets that you want to host!
translation.Não é possível excluir um pet para o qua: Cannot delete a pet which has already been booked in a reservation.
